root.name: pixelRowAlign
root.description: Align pixels row by row according to specific threshold, originally used for surface tracking in ultrasound imaging
root.author: oeway - Wei Ouyang
root.changelog:
- Version 2.0.0.3 Date 2013-11-03 14:06:48
Fixed roi name bug
- Version 2.0.0.2 Date 2013-11-03 13:40:16
Compatible with Icy1.4
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2013-10-25 17:23:32
Add threshold mode support
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2013-10-25 13:07:58
Add compatibility to normal ROI, so all the 2D ROI is supported
- Version 0.0.1.0 Date 2013-10-23 17:36:59
